passwordhasbeenupdated.headTitle: Your password has been updated successfully for PokerFace
passwordhasbeenupdated.ContentText: Your password has been updated successfully. You can now use your new password to log in.
passwordhasbeenupdated.FooterText1: For security, this request was received from {ip_address} on a {operating_system} device, using {browser_name}.
passwordhasbeenupdated.FooterText2: If you did not request a password update, please connect to PokerFace and change your password or contact support if you have questions.
